sentences.english: For every cup of coffee you drink you will need to drink another TWO glasses of water to counter the diuretic effect.

sentences.english: Some people with recurrent stones choose to take prescription diuretics to reduce the risk.

sentences.english: The main function of mother-in-law man is clear hot detoxify , subsidence of a swelling and diuresis.

sentences.english: It is recommended to monitor plasma potassium levels when using benazepril in combination with a potassium sparing diuretic.

sentences.english: Furthermore, it enhances thirst and stimulates the secretion of the antidiuretic hormone.

sentences.english: Because osmotic diuresis dehydrates , this basically is be caused by.

sentences.english: Just like alcohol, caffeine is a diuretic.

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
